name: The Supermarket Hunter
description:
!BUY EVERYTHING!


--!FLEX!--

Buy more as you want.
Do you wanna be rich? Wealthy?
Do you want to buy Anything you want?

!YOU CAN DO THAT!

!BUY EVERYTHING!

How to play


The game's main stage is an Market Center.
You can buy everything if you have a proper card(Which can get in game when you buy more).

This is first perspective movement game.
If you click 'e', you can buy what you want point with mouse.

You should click the mouse button and 'e' key for buy the stuff before other people buy that!
Move Faster as possible as for buy everything until you can buy GOLD PILLAR.

ALL PEOPLE ALSO WANNA BUY THINGS


But, also Lot of others wanna buy things in market too.
You has to avoid them and buy what you want.
They also obsess to JUST BUY.
And they will not stop until some one buy GOLD PILLAR.

TIME IS LIMITED


Buying time is limited for all people.
Let's buy things before time is done!
You should move quicker before everything sold out!



ENJOY the play! Thank you!
